title: Get a connection's IAM policy
description: Get the current Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for a BigQuery connection. The policy defines which principals have what permissions on the connection resource.

objective.narrative: This sample shows the first step in the "read-modify-write" pattern for updating an IAM policy. Developers must first get the current policy and its etag, modify the policy in-memory, and then use the etag to set the new policy. This prevents race conditions where two clients try to update the policy simultaneously.
